pages.text: Each type of Vault Gear can roll a different $(l)rarity$(). The $(l)better$() the $(l)rarity$(), the more $(l)implicits$(), $(l)prefixes$() and $(l)suffixes$() the gear rolls. $(br2)The $(l)higher$() the $(l)level$() of Vault Gear, which scales with Vault Level when it was found or crafted, the better the $(l)tiers$() of the $(l)implicits$(), $(l)prefixes$() and $(l)suffixes$(). Gear Level can be lowered when combined with a $(l)Banished Soul$() in an anvil.

pages.title: Available Rarities
pages.text: $(li)Scrappy$(li)Common$(li)Rare$(li)Epic$(li)Omega $(br2)A $(l)Scrappy+$() piece of gear may roll a scrappy or above rarity. An $(l)Epic+$() piece of gear may only roll an epic or above rarity. $(br2)Wearing Vault Gear is not restricted to any player level.

pages.title: Vault Swords
pages.text: Vault Swords can be found in Vaults or crafted in the $(l)Vault Forge$(). They can be changed transmog in the $(l)Transmogrification Table$() and upgraded in the $(l)Vault Artisan Station$(). To scrap, smelt them in a furnace or use the $(l)Vault Recycler$() for additional scrap. $(br2)
Vault Swords cannot be used for anything else except combat, like breaking cobwebs.

Vault Axes cannot be used for anything else except combat, like breaking logs.

pages.title: Vault Shields
pages.text: Vault Shields can be found in Vaults or crafted in the $(l)Vault Forge$(). They can be changed transmog in the $(l)Transmogrification Table$() and upgraded in the $(l)Vault Artisan Station$(). To scrap, smelt them in a furnace or use the $(l)Vault Recycler$() for additional scrap. $(br2)
Vault Shields work different than a regular Shield. When equipped in the player's offhand, the shield has a chance to block. The player cannot choose to block.
